results.content: Compared to other courses I've taken on OP2, this is great.  The instructor actually shows what and were to click, and he doesn't randomly move the mouse while he is talking (which I find extremely distracting) and it is set up so you can learn by doing--creating your pages while he creates his.

results.content: This is a practical, hands on, quick course on Optimize Press. There is so much in OP, but due to lack of practical training, most of the things get unused and that also improperly. I learnt a lot from this course and will be implementing all...

results.content: Mitch goes into more depth in this course than some of the videos on the OptimizePress site. I'll be reviewing what I'm doing on my site to make sure I'm using the concepts Mitch presents. I'd recommend anyone who desires to improve their OptimizePress site take this course.
results.content_html: Mitch goes into more depth in this course than some of the videos on the OptimizePress site. I'll be reviewing what I'm doing on my site to make sure I'm using the concepts Mitch presents. I'd recommend anyone who desires to improve their OptimizePress site take this course.

results.content: I really enjoyed this course.  Mitch has an engaging style and it never got even remotely boring.  The delivery, content, and bonuses all offered supreme value.  He has certainly removed all the trepidation I had to go build my first site with OP2.  I am excited to implement these skills and will certainly take him up on the offer to request feedback on what I have created.  What a huge bonus!  I will definitely recommend this course to others.

results.content: Easily Learn Web Development With Drop & Drag: OptimizePress by Mitch Asser was just the right length of course to go through the first time in one sitting and still have all the training to get the desired result in Optimize Press. Well done!
